wikipedia_page.main: Barbara Florence Amelia Wyatt Hardy (17 July 1930 – 10 January 2012) was a British figure skater who competed in ladies' singles. She was a two-time European bronze medalist (1951 and 1952) and finished seventh at the 1952 Winter Olympics. She was coached by Jacques Gerschwiler.Wyatt is the mother of NHL hockey player Mark Hardy.

response: Jacques Gerschwiler (10 September 1898 – 4 May 2000) was a Swiss figure skater and coach. Among his students were Cecilia Colledge, Jeannette Altwegg, Sally Stapleford, Bridget Adams, Barbara Wyatt, and Jacqueline Harbord.
| 1951 ||  Zürich ||  Jeannette Altwegg ||  Jacqueline du Bief ||  Barbara Wyatt ||
| 1952 ||  Vienna ||  Jeannette Altwegg ||  Jacqueline du Bief ||  Barbara Wyatt ||
Hardy is the son of Olympic figure skater Barbara Wyatt and former ice hockey player Lea Hardy.
